statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key, device_id, creation_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND creation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(creation_date) AS latest_creation_date, COUNT(key_id) AS total_keys FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND encryption_key LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY creation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '530d7d65-4d02-4b4c-9db5-52fc18d17271';
SELECT device_name, encryption_key_id FROM iot_devices WHERE encryption_key_id IS NULL;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id IN ('9b71b7b5-21fb-4a45-ba29-9937d9f1cbde', 'e9ba24ca-29b3-4418-bf69-946e51dcd678');
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE device_name = 'Smart Fridge';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE encryption_key_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, key_value FROM iot_devices JOIN encryption_keys ON iot_devices.encryption_key_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, public_key FROM device_registration WHERE device_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM data_transmission WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'Test%' AND key_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, public_key FROM device_registration WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM data_transmission ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value, id FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device_info ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_location, device_name FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT username, access_level FROM access_control WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%encryption%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM device_info ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, TIMESTAMP, message FROM communication_logs WHERE action = 'error' ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, device_id FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT message, encrypted_message FROM communications WHERE communication_id = 1;
SELECT data_payload FROM transmissions WHERE transmission_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT permission_id, permission_type FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT communication_id, message, timestamp FROM communications WHERE encrypted_message IS NOT NULL AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transmission_id, data_payload FROM transmissions WHERE LENGTH(data_payload) > 1000 ORDER BY transmission_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE '%Admin%' ORDER BY device_id;
